entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TarReader stops enumerating entries when stream is unseekable #74728
  • [wasm] `emcc` crash on `dotnet-runtime-perf` pipeline #74724
  • [wasm] V8 crash with`System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.Tests` on linux #74723
  • Incorrect behaviour of regex atomic groups #74722
  • Microsoft.NETCore.App.Crossgen2.sfxproj in source-build #74721

Closed

  • JsonSerializer deserialize big json in tasks memory leak #74725
  • JIT: RunOnGPUAttribute #8220
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add DateTime support overload for ToDateTime in PersianCalendar #74713
  • Fixup `impPopList` to eliminate the need to normalize SIMD and HWIntrinsic type handles #11670
    Future
  • wrong error messages in DeleteFile #45398
    8.0.0
  • Using hostfxr.h to Host Core AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory is empty #74720

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove MethodImplAttribute workaround #74727
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, community-contribution
  • Fix two auto-atomicity Regex bugs #74726
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Implement proper File System detection for Apple OSes #74560
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] For perf, remove Invoker pattern for fields #74693
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/7.0] Ensure that the result for PowMod is fully initialized #74672
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0] Fix stack unwinding for NativeAOT on Unix #74690
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Use the regType for extracting the RegisterType #74670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert SHFileOperation error to Win IO error #74607
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, community-contribution, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Fix Vector documentation #74701
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fold field offsets into array addresses #74719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74692
  • Use nproc without --all on Linux #74696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix RegexOptions.NonBacktracking matching end anchors at timeout check boundaries #74525
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono] Add Vector128 intrinsics for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Move `src/tests/BuildWasmApps/*` to `src/mono/wasm` #74698
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Don't crash compilation on invalid UnmanagedCallersOnly #74546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
